ComicInfo.Title: Spotlight: The Newbies!
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 23:43:36. [CVDB894414] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:05. [Issue ID 2275387]
ComicInfo.Characters: Beach Head,G.I. Joe [Black Hat,Lamprey,Dr. Mindbender,Cobra Commander,Duke,Cutter,Gyro-Viper,Cobra [Vipers,Multo,Laura 343,Polly,Mainframe,Sherlock,Techno-Vipers,Blowtorch],Night Vipers],B.A.T.s,Wild Bill,Outback,Shipwreck,Mongoose
ComicInfo.Summary: Spotlight: The Newbies!: Outback leads the three newest Joes - Black Hat, Mongoose, Multo and Sherlock - to investigate Cobra Island. They discover Cobra's newest facility is built under the facade of 'Cobra Casino.'
